overdueItems.description:
16 tasks marked complete without MATOP execution.
Validation commands (typecheck, build, test, lint) not run.
Attestations created with placeholder SHA256 hashes (all zeros).
Tasks affected: IFC-020, IFC-042, IFC-081, PG-009, PG-010, PG-011,
PG-012, PG-013, PG-014, IFC-126, IFC-148, IFC-153, IFC-154, IFC-155,
EXP-PLATFORM-001, EXP-SCRIPTS-001.
overdueItems.remediation_plan:
1. Run full validation suite (typecheck, build, test, lint)
2. Fix any validation failures discovered
3. Regenerate all attestations with real SHA256 hashes
4. Run MATOP for each task to verify completion properly
5. Update Sprint_plan.csv with accurate status based on MATOP verdicts
6. Implement CI enforcement to prevent future governance bypass
overdueItems.notes:
This is a governance violation discovered during Sprint 12 audit.
Build initially failed due to Server Component issue (onClick handler).
Tests have infrastructure issues (ResizeObserver mock).
IFC-042 attestation updated with real SHA256 hashes as remediation example.
Plan-linter errors fixed by adding 9 missing task overrides.

expiringSoonItems.description:
Full integration testing with IFC-001 (Architecture Spike) deferred.
Stub contract in place for Sprint 0, full integration in Sprint 1+.
expiringSoonItems.remediation_plan:
1. Complete IFC-001 in Sprint 1
2. Integrate ENV-017-AI with architecture decisions
3. Run full integration test suite
4. Remove stub contract exception
expiringSoonItems.notes: Cross-sprint dependency resolved via stub_contract. See PLAN-FIX-001.

expiringSoonItems.description:
External AI tools (Codex, Jules) integration deferred full security audit.
Sandbox security validated but comprehensive penetration testing pending.
expiringSoonItems.remediation_plan:
1. Complete security audit of Codex integration
2. Complete security audit of Jules integration
3. Run penetration tests on sandbox environment
4. Document security findings and mitigations
expiringSoonItems.notes: Sandbox security.json created. Full audit in Sprint 2.

expiringSoonItems.description:
AI-generated tests coverage target (>95%) not fully met.
Manual test writing required to reach target.
expiringSoonItems.remediation_plan:
1. Review AI-generated test quality
2. Add manual tests for edge cases
3. Reach 95% coverage target
4. Document test generation patterns
expiringSoonItems.notes: Current coverage may be lower. AI test generation is MVP.

expiringSoonItems.description:
LangChain cost optimization and predictive scaling deferred.
Basic rate limiting in place, advanced optimization pending.
expiringSoonItems.remediation_plan:
1. Implement cost prediction model
2. Configure auto-scaling rules
3. Set up cost alerting
4. Optimize chain execution paths
expiringSoonItems.notes: Basic cost logging enabled. Optimization is post-MVP.

expiringSoonItems.description:
